float3x4.h

00001 #ifndef _MATH_MATRIX3X4_H
00002 #define _MATH_MATRIX3X4_H
00003 
00004 
00005 #include <math/float4.h>
00006 #include <math/float3x3.h>
00007 #include <lang/assert.h>
00008 
00009 
00010 BEGIN_NAMESPACE(math) 
00011 
00012 
00013 class quaternion;
00014 class float4x4;
00015 
00016 
00024 class float3x4
00025 {
00026 public:
00027     enum
00028     { 
00030         ROWS    = 3, 
00032         COLUMNS = 4, 
00033     };
00034 
00035 #ifdef _DEBUG
00036 
00037     float3x4()                                                                      {float v = getNaN(); for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] = v;}
00038 #else
00039     float3x4()                                                                      {}
00040 #endif
00041         
00043     explicit float3x4( float diagonal );
00044 
00046     explicit float3x4( const float4x4& o );
00047 
00049     float3x4( const float3x3& rot, const float3& translation );
00050 
00052     float3x4( const float3x3& rot, const float3& translation, const float3& scale );
00053 
00055     float3x4( const quaternion& q, const float3& translation );
00056 
00058     float3x4( const quaternion& q, const float3& translation, const float3& scale );
00059 
00061     float3x4&       operator+=( const float3x4& other )                         {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] += other.m[i][j]; return *this;}
00062     
00064     float3x4&       operator-=( const float3x4& other )                         {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] -= other.m[i][j]; return *this;}
00065 
00067     void            setColumn( int i, const float3& c )                         {assert(i>=0&&i<COLUMNS); m[0][i]=c[0]; m[1][i]=c[1]; m[2][i]=c[2];}
00068 
00070     void            setRow( int i, const float4& c )                                {assert(i>=0&&i<ROWS); m[i][0]=c[0]; m[i][1]=c[1]; m[i][2]=c[2]; m[i][3]=c[3];}
00071 
00073     void            setRotation( const float3x3& rot );
00074 
00078     void            setRotation( const quaternion& q );
00079 
00085     void            setRotation( const NS(math,float3)& axis, float angle );
00086         
00088     void            setTranslation( const float3& t );
00089 
00094     void            setInverseOrthonormalTransform( const float3x3& rot, const float3& t );
00095 
00097     float&          operator()( int row, int column )                               {assert(row<ROWS&&column<COLUMNS); return m[row][column];}
00098 
00100     float3x4        operator*( float s ) const                                      {float3x4 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = m[i][j] * s; return a;}
00101 
00103     bool            operator==( const float3x4& other ) const                       {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) if ( m[i][j] != other.m[i][j] ) return false; return true;}
00104     
00106     bool            operator!=( const float3x4& other ) const                       {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) if ( m[i][j] != other.m[i][j] ) return true; return false;}
00107 
00109     float3x4        operator*( const float3x4& other ) const;
00110 
00112     float3x4        operator+( const float3x4& other ) const                        {float3x4 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = m[i][j] + other.m[i][j]; return a;}
00113     
00115     float3x4        operator-( const float3x4& other ) const                        {float3x4 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = m[i][j] - other.m[i][j]; return a;}
00116 
00118     float3x4        operator-() const                                               {float3x4 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = -m[i][j]; return a;}
00119 
00120     /* Matrix multiplication with 4-vector as 1-column matrix.*/
00121     float4          operator*( const float4& v ) const;
00122 
00124     const float&    operator()( int row, int column ) const                         {assert(row<ROWS&&column<COLUMNS); return m[row][column];}
00125 
00127     float           get( int row, int column ) const                                {return m[row][column];}
00128 
00130     float3          getColumn( int i ) const                                        {return float3( m[0][i], m[1][i], m[2][i] );}
00131 
00133     const float4&   getRow( int i ) const                                           {return *reinterpret_cast<const float4*>(m[i]);}
00134 
00136     float3x3        rotation() const;
00137 
00139     void            getRotation( float3x3* rot ) const;
00140 
00142     float3          translation() const                                             {return float3( m[0][3], m[1][3], m[2][3] );}
00143 
00145     void            getTranslation( NS(math,float3)* t ) const                      {t->x=m[0][3]; t->y=m[1][3]; t->z=m[2][3];}
00146 
00148     float3          scale() const;
00149 
00151     float3          transform( const float3& v ) const;
00152 
00154     float4          transform( const float4& v ) const;
00155 
00157     void            transform( const float3& v, float3* v1 ) const;
00158 
00160     void            transform( const float4& v, float4* v1 ) const;
00161 
00163     float3          rotate( const float3& v ) const;
00164 
00166     void            rotate( const float3& v, float3* v1 ) const;
00167 
00169     bool            finite() const;
00170 
00172     float           determinant3() const;
00173 
00175     float3x4        inverse() const;
00176 
00177 private:
00178     float           m[ROWS][COLUMNS] MATH_ALIGN_128;
00179 };
00180

00182 END_NAMESPACE() // math
